headline: Will CFO Luca Zaramella’s Expanded COO Role Reshape Mondelez’s (MDLZ) Cost Discipline and Growth Narrative?
summary: Mondelez International has appointed long-serving Chief Financial Officer Luca Zaramella as Chief Operating Officer effective February 1, 2026, giving him oversight of global commercial operations, sales, marketing, and supply chain while the company searches for a new CFO. This dual CFO-COO role concentrates financial and operational oversight in a single executive, hinting at a tighter link between cost discipline and commercial execution across Mondelez’s four regions.
